name: Quantum Quackers
description:
Two ducks are taking part in a lab experiment. But these aren’t just any regular ducks, they’re Quantum Quackers! Existing simultaneously within a split reality, they must use their special quantum properties to pass each puzzle as they eat grapes and solve test chambers to reach the slice of bread at the end.

This game was created as part of a group assignment as an introduction into game development.

Created by The Subatomic Ducklings
